Articles.Content:
I have just spent the last 2 hours making a craft that will deliver 4 map sats, each with their own ion engine, solar panels, batteries, mech jeb unit and mapsap dish only to discover that even with the small mech jeb capsule on the individual sats they still count as debris so the map sat wont work and mech jeb will not control the engines.

I also videoed the whole thing.

/sigh

// just wanted to vent
All you need is the DynaSat adapter. Why are you making it complicated?

i could use some more info on this, iev tried in the past to make one ship able to deploy other ships manable or drone, but i really dont know how. i know it can be done, is there a tut somewhere i can be pointed to?
